#summary features of the next release.

= In the next release (1.3.0) =

== XSD for XML configuration ==

Will be added the XML Schema relative to xml configuration.

== @JMapAccessor ==

This annotation permits to define custom methods of "get " and "set":
{{{
public class Destination {

   @JMapAccessor(get = "countValue", set = "redefineCount")
   private Integer count;

   public Integer countValue(){ ... }

   public void redefineCount(Integer count){ ... }

}
}}}

For specify the accessor methods of a mapped field from another:

{{{
public class Source {

  @JMap("count")
  @JMapAccessor(name = "count", get = "countValue", set = "redefineCount")
  private Integer source;

}

public class Destination {

   private Integer count;

   public Integer countValue(){ ... }

   public void redefineCount(Integer count){ ... }

}

}}}
in XML we will have two more attributes: "get" and "set" for mapped and target fields:
{{{
<attribute name="mappedField" get="getField" set="setField">
   <attributes>The internal exceptions are wrapped as runtime exception and relaunched.
      <attribute name=targetField" get="getTargetField" set="setTargetField"/>
   </attributes>
</attribute> 
}}}
== !XmlHandler ==

 Will be added:
 - JMapAccessor generation
 - xsd in generated xml

== Exception rethrown == 

The internal exceptions are wrapped as RuntimeException and relaunched.
